summary: This mod page contains all kinds of outfits and mods made compatible for use in Caliente's BodySlide program, including underwear and bikini versions of the main body, as well as footwear, amulets, and more.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4]CB++ is now a part of BodySlide by Caliente, which is available here: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/[/url][/size][/b]

[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/32731-1-1373551693.jpg[/img]

[b][size=4][color=#5EA2E5]Required Mods:[/color][/size][/b]

Caliente's Beautiful Bodies Edition (CBBE):
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666[/url]

BodySlide:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/[/url]

The various original armor mods have to be installed in order to use this mod's BodySlide support for those (see below).

[b][size=4][color=#5EA2E5]Installation via NMM[/color][/size][/b]

All packages available also are NMM (Nexus Mod Manager) compatible. I highly recommend using NMM for easy installation and removal. This will go a long way toward reducing bugs during upgrade etc.

1.) Download the files. Note on installing multiple files with NMM: When asked to upgrade, always say NO. Use the i+ icon on the left to rename mods to help tell them apart.

2.) Under optional files, make sure to download any packages that fit armor sets you already have - in particular Caliente's and Keo's. Again, always say NO when asked to upgrade.

Please ask in the thread if you are having installation trouble!

[b][size=4][color=#5EA2E5]Manual Installation[/color][/size][/b]

All packages can also be downloaded and installed manually as well - you may wish to merge them into one folder and re-zip them first. Just be aware of the much greater potential for losing track of installed files (and thus higher likelihood of creating conflicts and bugs) during upgrade.

1.) Install the original CBBE body by Caliente
2.) Install BodySlide by Caliente
3.) Merge additional BodySlide outfit mods like Caliente's Vanilla Outfits with your BodySlide folder
4.) Correctly merge this mods folders with your existing BodySlide folder
5.) Use BodySlide.exe :)

[b][size=4][color=#5EA2E5]Known Issues:[/color][/size][/b]

1.) Sliders are not perfect! They work best closer to the original shape. As your settings get more extreme, you may see clipping. A slider that is at 0 for the CBBE base shape, for instance, may clip as you approach 100. The BreastsSSH slider in particular often causes clipping at high values, especially in combination with other sliders that affect breast size. While we encourage experimentation with sliders (even outside the 0-100 range), we must emphasize that clipping is likely so check your results! Please do not report minor clipping due to extreme slider settings as a "bug".

[b][size=4][color=#5EA2E5]File Information:[/color][/size][/b]

[b][size=3][color=#98FB98]Caliente Vanilla Outfits[/color][/size][/b]
BodySlide 2 support for Caliente's Vanilla Outfits ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12273]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12273[/url]), and some retexture mods based upon it. Requires original Caliente Vanilla Outfits to be installed!

[b][size=3][color=#98FB98]Mak (not included)[/color][/size][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25259]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25259[/url]

[b][size=3][color=#98FB98]KillerKeo[/color][/size][/b]
BodySlide 2 conversions of KillerKeos skimpy armor pack.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3654]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3654[/url]*
*Note: KK's original mod is not actually required to generated these outfits. However, it's highly recommend that you install his mod first. Without KK's mod, not only will you miss some support files (.esp, first person meshes etc.), but KK outfits generated from BodySlide will not be removable by NMM since they won't have been put there by NMM in the first place.

[b][size=3][color=#98FB98]Footwear[/color][/size][/b] (Feet, Boots, Shoes and a few Gauntlets)
Vanilla footwear support for Caliente's and killerkeo's vanilla outfit packs.
Required if you use the Ankles slider, or to avoid chubby legs and calves clipping through boots.

[b][size=3][color=#98FB98]Amulets[/color][/size][/b]
Use this to make amulets fit your preset (see images).

[b][size=3][color=#98FB98]Various - support for:[/color][/size][/b]

[b]R18Pn 02 - Leere Armor[/b] - [color=#778899]by NPR/KURESE[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11756]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11756[/url]

[b]Demon Hunter Armor V2[/b] - [color=#778899]by BloodFree/jmenaru[/color]
Requires patch in misc. files for scarf!
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29419]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29419[/url]

[b]Seraphine Armor[/b] - [color=#778899]by BloodFree/jmenaru[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24723]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24723[/url]

[b]Gatti 12 Jewelry Outfit[/b] [color=#778899]by gatti2012:[/color]

[b]LustDesign - Sovngarde Steel Armor[/b] [color=#778899]by lustrianna:[/color]

[b]Note: Each one of those requires the original mod to be installed first![/b]

[b][size=4][color=#5EA2E5]More BodySlide Mods[/color][/size][/b]

[b]Vampire Cuirass[/b] [color=#778899]by newmiller:[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57429]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57429[/url]

[b][size=4][color=#5EA2E5]Permission Notes[/color][/size][/b]

All rights reserved by the mod authors.
Please do not modify or re-upload these files anywhere without expressed permission from ChronoTrigger77 or ousnius.
If you wish to use any part of this mod in another Nexus file, please make sure to request permission first!
All requests should go to ChronoTrigger77 or ousnius.

[b][size=4][color=#5EA2E5]Credits[/color][/size][/b]

Caliente - for the CBBE body, BodySlide and Outfit Studio.
stuffed_bunny - for the advanced sliders (previously CB++) and many conversions included in these sets.
ChronoTrigger77 - for lots of work on outfits.
ousnius - for BodySlide, Outfit Studio and work on outfits.
killerkeo - for the original KK skimpy armor sets.
Bethesda - for addicting as all again and again with utterly immersive gameplay - and for having the wisdom to realize that we can make it even better. :-)
author: Caliente - ChronoTrigger77 - ousnius - stuffed_bunny

files.name: 1 - Calientes Vanilla Outfits
files.fileName: CB Plus Plus 2 - Calientes Vanilla Outfits-32731-1-0-1.7z
files.changelogHtml:
- removed TGL Nordic Chainmail from Caliente set (CB++ sliders for this set will be released directly with the TGL Nordic Chainmail mod)
- cleaned up CB++ presets for easier use by mods outside of CB++ set
- restored clear package separation (1-6, no overlap), so you can choose just the CB++ packages you want and install via NMM or manually
- added the following outfits to CB++ Various: Argent Iron, Diano, Gatti Jewelry, Sovngarde Steel

files.name: 3 - Footwear

files.name: Layer Bikini - TBBP Patch
files.changelogHtml:
- added CB++ support for 3 new outfits to CB++ Various: Osare Underwear, Demon Hunter Armor and Alyn Shir Armor
- moved TBBP Layer Bikini patch from CB++ Various to its own file in the misc. section
- CB++ Bodies group restructured to reduce damage done by building it (CB++ Body will be built last)
- not existing "RaiseBelly" slider removed

files.name: Demon Hunter V2 - Scarf Patch
files.changelogHtml:
Main:
- added Pushup Slider to Nude bodies for compatibility
- updated preset files

Various:
- new outfit: Demon Hunter v2 Armor - by BloodFree/jmenaru
- new outfit: Seraphine Armor - by BloodFree/jmenaru
- new outfit: TM BallGown - by zzjay
- new outfit: Ashara Romantic Outfit - by SydneyB
- new outfit: R18Pn 02 - Leere Armor - by NPR/KURESE
- added Alyn Shir TBBP variant
- revised Argent Iron and added TBBP variant
- moved lighting fix for Bikini Trouble to CB++ Various

Misc:
- added Demon Hunter V2 scarf patch for CB++ compatibility
